00039 class Resource: virtual public ::EngineSubsystem
00040 {
00041         friend class __internal::ResourceLibrary;
00042 public://TODO: make this private
00043         Resource();
00044         virtual ~Resource();
00045 public:
00047 
00051         bool    ready();
00053 
00061         template<typename T>
00062         operator T();
00064 
00072         template<typename T>
00073         T       get();
00075         void    waitForResource();
00077         EString id();
00078 protected:
00079         //methods
00080 private:
00081         //data
00082         void*                                                                                   m_Resource;
00083         core::multithreading::Mutex*                                    m_Mutex;//This mutex is locked, while m_Ready is null
00084         unsigned                                                                                m_Ready;
00085         EString                                                                                 m_ResourceID;
00086 };
00087 
00088 //========= Implementation ==============================================================
00089 template<typename T>
00090 Resource::operator T()
00091 {
00092         waitForResource();
00093         T op = dynamic_cast<T> (m_Resource);
00094         if(op != NULL)
00095                 return op;
00096         else throw resources::ResourceException("Failed to cast data to required type");
00097 }
00098 template<typename T>
00099 T       Resource::get()
00100 {
00101         waitForResource();
00102         T op = dynamic_cast<T> (m_Resource);
00103         if(op != NULL)
00104                 return op;
00105         else throw resources::ResourceException("Failed to cast data to required type");
00106 }
00107 
00108 }
